guide.title: Three simple steps to create a workout
guide.description: Below is a guide for a simpler understanding of how to build your workout plan.
guide.step1: Create a workout day. This is a set of exercises you plan to perform on the training day. Later, you can fill it with the exercises you’ve created.
guide.step2: Set the weight of the bars you plan to use for calculating the total weight. Specify which plate weights you will use in the exercises.
guide.step3: Create exercises. You can create exercises and then add them to the desired workout day, specifying the number of repetitions, the weight used, rest time after the exercise, etc.

addDay.title: Here is the workout day title.
addDay.addExistingnBackground: you can select an existing background

modalAddDay.description: Select a background image for the workout day.
